about_the_game: Return to the snowy colorado rockies and fall in love again with this wonderfully jazzy and classy soundtrack. Let the charming tines of the piano and the heartfelt thump of the acoustic bass whisk you away to a land of wintery romance once again as you relive the memories of "Colorado Cocoa Club".

Let the charming tines of the piano and the heartfelt thump of the acoustic bass whisk you away to a land of wintery romance once again as you relive the memories of "Colorado Cocoa Club".
name: Colorado Cocoa Club Soundtrack
